message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.IR. 

The paper deals with foreground segmentation in video sequences, which is a classic topic in computer vision. The proposed method uses a deep convolutional neural network (CNN) framework for joint background reconstruction and foreground segmentation. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CV (Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition). The paper also mentions the joint optimization of reconstruction loss and segmentation loss, which suggests the involvement of machine learning techniques. Hence, cs.LG (Machine Learning) is also a likely sub-category. The paper also mentions the incorporation of prior semantic knowledge, which suggests the involvement of artificial intelligence techniques, making cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) another likely sub-category. The paper deals with video sequences, which suggests the involvement of multimedia techniques, making cs.MM (Multimedia) another likely sub-category. Finally, the paper deals with foreground segmentation, which is a common task in image retrieval, making cs.IR (Information Retrieval) a possible sub-category.
